name: Return to Castle Wool
description:
In a world conceived entirely of cloth governed by a generative goddess named Embriesse, a young explorer stumbles upon what appears to be a mysterious entrance, deciding to enter. 
From here begins the adventure that will lead the player to discover the secret of the dark dungeon. 

FEATURES:

  • Single player 
  • Movement in squares
  • Magic attacks
  • Crafting 
  • Simple animations
  • Simple in-game tutorial 

DEVELOPED BY:

WERERABBIT GAMES (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2019/2020)

Programming
Davide Di Lorenzo
Marco Elia

Game Design
Riccardo Brizzi
Alessio "Chicco" Gallo

3D Art

Mattia Suanno

2D Art
